name: morning-briefing
description: Daily 7 AM status briefing to contractor via WhatsApp
timezone_note: Schedule runs in the server timezone configured via timedatectl on the Droplet (see YOUR_TIMEZONE in .env.example)
prompt: Generate a morning briefing for the contractor. Read all active projects from the tracking sheet. For each active project, summarize: status, crew assigned, budget remaining, any pending crew replies, upcoming deadlines. Send the briefing as a WhatsApp message to the contractor.
